sources.title: ...Almost
sources.description: A charming seriocomic romantic fantasy in which a neglected young wife (Rosanna Arquette) escapes her disappointments by loosing herself in lurid romantic novels. Good cast and production. Filmed in Australia. MPAA PG (see note). Directed by Michael Pattinson. Released in 1990 (Australia & Sweden only). Complete print. A.k.a. "Wendy Cracked a Walnut" NOTE: Although this film has an MPAA rating it wasn't released theatrically in the US.

metadata.Plot: Romantic comedy that mixes magical realism with traditional Australian urban-outback contrasts. The plot centers on a bored woman (the eponymous Wendy) who conjures up the perfect lover, Jake, while her husband is out on the road suffering comical mishaps.
metadata.Actors: Rosanna Arquette, Bruce Spence, Hugo Weaving
